item.title: A First Post
item.description: This is a placeholder post. Another footnote example appears here.1 Inline math such as $x^2 + y^2 = 1$ should render via KaTeX, and display math should also work: $$ \int_0^1 x^2 , dx = \frac{1}{3}. $$ A short code snippet: 1 2 def square(x): return x * x This explains something related to the theorem above. ↩︎
